Starbucks Reserve brings you the finest coffees from origin countries - ones with distinct flavors that amaze and captivate. This Saturday, we celebrate a year of exquisite coffee served at Starbucks Reserve.

Thank you for the overwhelming response for our coffee session on 31 May. We have chosen the lucky 15 entries and we hope to see you all soon.

We are sorry if Android users such as yourself cannot enjoy this feature for now. However, please do be patient with us as we are currently developing an Android app for you 'Droid users out there. Thank you for your support!

The store must have made a mistake and we will be speaking with them immediately on this. The promotion only starts tomorrow. Thank you for alerting us to this.

3.post_text:
The right grind for the right brew. #ProTip

• French Press = Coarse. Chunky. Like kosher salt.
• Flat Bottom Filter = Medium. Gritty. Like coarse sand.
• Cone Filter = Fine. Feels like granulated sugar.
• Espresso = Super fine. Almost powder.

comments.message: Firstly Starbucks need to stop burning their beans... And use the right water temperature. =)
Starbucks sucks

Your baristas dont even get it right. Several occasions i been handed finely grind beans despite my numerous reminders "its for french press, coarse please" 
so small amounts my coffee powder passed through my french press filter, i ended up ingested the powders, ah well, i might end up growing my own coffee bean in my stomach!
Secondly they shld just close...
Totally agreed. The so-called baristas are mostly part-timers, with little training. They come and go so fast.
Haha Starbucks sucks! Totally true!

4.post_text:
If you've missed them last week, fret not! The Ukulele Girls will be performing live again this weekend, 3.30pm (Sat & Sun) at our beautiful, iconic 100th Store at Starbucks Fullerton Waterboat House. Be sure to pop by, pick up a CD and be treated to a complimentary tall-sized beverage on the house.

Starbucks at The Fullerton Waterboat House
3 Fullerton Rd #02-01 (street level)
Singapore 049215

13.post_text:
Dear all, it seems that there has been an advertisement circulating around the internet which states that we are running "Happy Hour" in May which allows for 1-for-1 on Frappuccinos.

We would like you to know that this is a US-only promotion and will not be available in Singapore. 

Keep up to date with the Starbucks Singapore page for official announcements on Singapore exclusives. Have a great weekend ahead!

comments.message: Dessy Desmond
Kevin Tran mua dùm e cái ly ở giửa đê, ở vn cũng có mà mắc hơn
Terry Miles

Hi Guek Hoon,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us on this matter on Facebook and via email as well. We apologize for not connecting with you directly on Facebook with your feedback.

From the photos and information shared, you are right in saying that our baristas made a mistake in the placements of the "fully redeemed" stickers which was misleading in its message.

Once again, we're truly sorry about this experience and we're very grateful for the feedback that you have provided. This would help us to improve and ensure that future promotions will be better executed.

We hope that this experience does not deter you from visiting our stores again.

Hi Loh Hui Nee, Shawn Wong, Elston Ng, 

Please do email us at card@starbucks.com.sg and our team will look into this glitch for you. Do allow us up to 3 working days to get back to your request.

Apologies for any inconvenience caused.

Hey Carol Chia, Guek Hoon, Nelly Chng, Felicia J Norfor,

The 2x beverage points promotion is still on until 30 April. The "fully redeemed" sign refers to the Tote Bag promotion. There will be no more points accumulation for tote bags as we have fully sold out the bags. 

If you have qualified for the tote bags before yesterday, we have set aside for you a bag for redemption at our stores. 

We hope this clears this up.

dear starbucks. I've been a regular patron of your stores for a while now and to b very honest it's disappointing to realize how your new creations are no longer tasting pleasant. great effort by your company though in attempts to roll out new things regularly, however, I personally feel the 2 new drinks are not at all worth the amount we are paying for. 
if your intent is to retain existing customers and bring in new regulars. may I suggest for more effort to be placed into the tasting part before launch please. honestly, I would have left for other chains if not for your wonderful baristas.

It is so disappointing. Alot of us are jus short of 1 cup to get the tote bag. No notice was given by the staff tt its fully redeem. N the tote bag counter jus stop at the the last cup. New brought drinks brought today jus add into free drink counter. 

Starbucks should collect order from those who are short of few cups n make more tote bag for us to redeem.. as it's still not the dateline yet.. 

Believe alot of the Starbucks card holder will wan to get tt tote bag instead of the free drink in return.
Typically Singaporean I say.... Tote bag or not, I'll still support Starbucks!!! Yummo...😄

Agree !!!! The poster clearly states that it's until 24/4. So how can they just stop accumulating our drinks counts like that. If you cannot fulfill the redemption now, at least honor the dates that you said it will be accumulated and then let us redeem at a later date. You CANNOT just stop accumulating counts as you please !!!! Learn from Macdonalds !!!! You have to honor what your promotion states. Else why is there a start and end date ??? You cannot stop people from running a marathon mid way and tell them no more medals. Sorry.

I just sent this to your web page for feedback:
I'm very upset about the Starbucks Totebag promotion. When this promotion was ran, it was mentioned it would be starting from Feb 14 all the way to 26th April. Just on 11th April, I visited the Great World City outlet and was told I had 12 drinks then. On 12th April, I visited the Fullerton Boathouse branch and bought another two drinks, which means I should have 14. On 17th April, I bought a drink which should be counted as double as I receive a SMS from Starbucks which says starting from 15th Apr to 30th Apr, one beverage bought would count as two. Hence, by right my purchase on 17th Apr should count as two, bringing my total of purchases to be 16 and thereby qualifying to redeem the tote bag. 
However, to my dismay when I visited your outlet at Vivo today (19th Apr), your staff checked for me and told me I had only 14. This is really ridiculous. Firstly, two points got missing for no reason and secondly Starbucks chose to end the promotion before the stated 26th Apr deadline. I had spent so much effort to accumulate the points to redeem the tote bag and now all these efforts are wasted.
I would be expecting your management to investigate in detail how did I end up with only 14 drinks when I should have 16 and get back to me.
I'm deeply disappointed with Starbucks and expecting a satisfactory answer or else believed my faith and support in Starbucks would be eroding.
I collect starbucks' items. Thumbdrive and planner and... you name it. I want the tote! Just 1 cup away~~

Dear starbucks, I have just asked for a staff whether there is still valid bag and he said yes, but I suddenly found the point cannot be accumulated anymore. Why you just stop point accumulation suddenly before the deadline? Do you know that there is still a lot of people wish to accumulate for it? Even when I heard there is no more stock, it is better than that I know there is a bag but I cannot accumulate more. NEED AN EXPLAINATION!!

Why is there an announcement today to your barristas that there is no longer collection of 'cups' towards the tote bag when the end of promotion was supposed to be 23rd?

And why are we not informed via signs/FB/what have you?
Lucita Rivera Dahlia Alagano Corpuz Melody Arlene Mari

They can't just simply discontinue the promo abruptly like that before the deadline is up. It really is not about the bag. The bag doesn't cost much anyway. As starbucks fan, you purchase and support upon knowing there is the promo. And then after spending much effort and money to accumulate the drinks to get items like this to keep, they then come and tell us "sorry, promo is over". This is not the right way to treat your customers
I believe this picture says a thousand words
This is not about the tote bag but how starbucks treats its customers.
I bought 15 drinks. Just short of one only. Thought starbucks said redemption until 26th April?  Wasted my efforts

I felt that Starbucks should still honor the promotion duration as there are many who are short of a few points ( I know I am short of "3" since no staff knew about the cessation of the promo prior to 17th). & mind you, there are many actively clocking the redemption points before the x2 promo kicked in. The x2 promo just made alot of us felt cheated because we were clocking it 1 by 1. & poof, promo over before you know it.

Laila Gabuyo
Arlene Gloria
Dahlia Alagano
Corpuz Melody
Myriam Quinit

I am upset! I have 10 points on Mon and I bought 2 more drinks in between. So I should have 16 points which qualify me for the bag! I was totally shocked and upset just now at Starbucks when they told me I only have 12 now after my purchase today now!! Where happened to my 4 points earned from the last 2 drinks! I am so disappointed as I can't believe that Starbucks' service and system to be this unprofessional!! I have asked the staff to investigate into this, expecting an acceptable reply to me! I was so looking forward to getting the bag today and it turned out to be utter disappointment!!! 😞
Omg!! I was drinkng frm starbucks these few wks just for the bag n i jus nd 2 mre points!!!

Hi Starbucks
Does that mean I only need 8 drinks to meet the quota of getting the tote bag?
If the promotion wun last pls let us know earlier. If not consumers will feel cheated.

When I went to Yishun outlet the day before, the cashier told me I need to purchase another 3 more cups and I'm entitled to the free tote bag. So the very next day, I went to Woodlands Exchange. I did not get my 6 points when I made my purchase of 3 handcraft coffee. I doesn't want to argue with the girl that was serving me and left ANGRILY!

Masita - if the government leads by example about not caring for its own people, then what can you expect from the businesses conducted here? Most places don't care about consumers; they just blatantly cheat them of their money.

So mad!!! jus need 2 cups to redeem the bag n thhrefore Went to Starbucks suntec to buy 2 drinks. 
N staff told me my 2nd hand crafted drinks not registered and therefore i can't get my bag?? 
Y??

19.post_text:
Earn 2 points for every purchase of a handcrafted beverage with a Starbucks Card from 15 - 30 April 2014. Close in on that complimentary beverage, double quick-time. 

Points collection for the Starbucks Tote Bag has ended due to complete allocation of tote bags. Customers who have already qualified can still redeem their tote bag from stores.

comments.message: aaaaaa banana mango frappuccino! looks great Andrea Zhang

I hope Starbucks Singapore can do something about the bananas they use for the Banana Mango Frappe.

I know the recipe is Mango Passionfruit Frappe + milk + 1 banana blended in. Price wise also another additional $1 (which is the price of the banana you are selling at your counter).

I am not complaining about the price, but the banana you use is too small (please don't tell me you chose smaller and sweeter bananas, I don't believe), because the ones you are selling at your counter shrunk in size as well, and they are certainly not sweet.

I have went to bukit panjang branch, clementi mall branch, and bugis branch. All the baristas were telling me that they have no clue why the bananas provided were that tiny (to blend in the drink).

Thanks.

Sincerely,
Christabel.

Hey, heard from one of ur barista that the ingrediants used in the caramel drizzle that used for any caramel drinks contains E471 that contained pork gelatin? Can anyone from @Starbucks Singapore  verify this as you do have alot of muslims customers.

Thank you for your patience.
